promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a massive special serpent electric-type pokemon wearing yellow and teal bracers. It can be found in city-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or serpent. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Voltwisp, a a massive special serpent electric-type pokemon. It can be found in city-like environments It has the following abilities: Shock Bolt. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "serpent", "electric" or "Voltwisp". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, serpent-like, special, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, yellow and teal ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Within urban landscapes, this colossal coil creature crackles with energy. With a Shock Bolt, Voltwisp can illuminate the darkest nights.
